Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authorization granted to the county of Tompkins to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes to November 30, 2022
Summary: Extends the authorization granted to the county of Tompkins to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes to November 30, 2022.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the authorization of the county of Tompkins to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes
